item.title: Goodreader app now supports annotating PDFs
item.description:
The latest update to the best \$.99 I've ever spent on an all for my iPad just made the application even better. Goodreader now allows you to mark up PDFs, adding notes, highlighting text, or drawing. It can save the markup in the same file or make a copy for you, preserving the original.

If you have \$1 and an iPad, this app is well worth it.
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
